name: Jurassic Skate VelociRaptor. Dino Skating In Prehistoric Temple Wold
name_original: Jurassic Skate VelociRaptor. Dino Skating In Prehistoric Temple Wold
description:
◉ Jurassic Dino Skate ◉

Come now and play with the best dino game ever. Skate on the jungle and collect coins in this incredible adventure of skating. The funniest velociraptor ever. You need to be careful and jump or slide to avoid crash with different obstacles. Very intuitive and addictive game play.

Download this incredible velociraptor game!

◉ Main Features ◉

• Smooth Controls
• Raptor Sounds
• Endless Game-Play
• Funky Effects and Sounds
• Real 3D Dinosaur Motion


Come know, take your skate and go on the jungle adventure!

Do not forget to give us a review, to improve our games!
